import React, { useState } from 'react' import ShortBoxList from '../../Components/ShortBoxList/ShortBoxList' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { CourseData } from './CoursesData' const TutionCourses = () => { return ( <> Discover Our Top Rated Courses } headpara={ <>

Join our comprehensive Quranic education program designed to nurture both knowledge and spiritual growth at your own pace.

} >
{CourseData.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

Read More
))}
) } export default TutionCourses;
